name: Haunted hedge maze
description:
You enter a maze to find bones worth lots of money. But instead find out the maze is filled with mysteries and haunted by an evil ghost that died in that maze. The ghost doesn't like new visitors and will seek to find you if you touch any bones.   

Update 1.1 - Release date 04/05/2023:

- Added to story

- Fixed one bone not appearing 

Note: this is my first game ever, I hope you all enjoy that play it :)
